description: Topped by maroon glaes trim, the crenellated, oaken bulwarks that surround this deck create a fantastic blend of ship and castle.  Immediately aft of the foremast, the galley chimney rises through the middle of the steam grating: a cylinder of heat-discolored black iron surrounded by a gleaming symmetry of ebon glaes.  Aft of the grating stands the belfry, itself a testimony to the skill of the glaes-crafters' art.
title: [Glaesen Star, Fo'c'sle Deck]
[Glaesen Star, Fo'csle Deck]
